main_info.paragraph: Day 114: Fixing the divergence issue
Wasn't really the learning rate that was the problem. I did make it smaller so it takes longer to diverge.
Don't have an experience limit right now. Might also be that the system is picking old data that it never gets rid of old experiences and that it interfering with learning.

Could potentially be the error function. The error is the sum to the power of 2 which will create huge errors. Not good for the system when it suddenly has to increment the weight by a huge amount. Another reason to get rid of old data that can cause variance.
Day 113: Running fun fun
Think learning rate might be too big. So I set it to 0.001
Fixed issue where I was only using policy weights and not using target weights for next state.
Ran 5.80 miles in 65:00
